<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Policy Set Status (v3.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v3.0/api/policysets/{policy_set_id}/status"}></MethodEndpoint>



List a specific policy set status of a tenant.

## Request
